snippet: Fakhra Younas had 38 surgeries to repair the gruesome damage inflicted by a vengeful Pakistani man who had doused her face in acid, virtually melting her mouth, nose and ears. But some wounds, the interior ones, refused to heal.
abstract: Fakhra Younas had 38 surgeries to repair the gruesome damage inflicted by a vengeful Pakistani man who had doused her face in acid, virtually melting her mouth, nose and ears. But some wounds, the interior ones, refused to heal.

headline.main: Years After an Acid Attack, a Woman's Suicide Stirs Pakistan
